Title

TSPS 2.12 Evaluation Services
---------------------------------------

Reference Information
--------------------

- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01008220
- **Solicitation Number**: N23-19744
- **Publication Date**: September 26, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 14, 2022 (2:00 PM)

Notice Type and Method
--------------------

- **Offering Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

Project Overview
----------------

The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) is seeking proposals from qualified consulting services firms to provide evaluation services for the “Idea to Innovation (I2I)” grants program. The selected contractor will work with NSERC’s Evaluation Division to design and execute an evaluation of the grants.

Key Details
------------

- **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- ** regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Authority**: NSERC

Eligibility and Evaluation
-------------------------

- **Eligibility criteria**: NSERC will evaluate bids based on the expertise and experience of the bidder.
- **Evaluation criteria**: NSERC will assess bids based on relevance, methodology, and adherence to scope.

Procurement Documents
---------------------

Interested contractors are invited to obtain a copy of the bid solicitation documents from the Canada Buy and Sell (Canadabuyssell.gc.ca) website.
